docs.text: Skill Description Details Arrow Volley Shoot a volley of arrows. Deal 3d4 piercing damage to all enemies. Backstab Attack an enemy from behind, dealing 1d6 extra damage on a successful hit. Purge self of Hidden; Attack an enemy; Deal 1d6 piercing damage to an enemy. Chant Bolster yourself with a holy chant. Grant yourself Chanting (Improve all saves by 1, improve bonus spell DC by 1, improve bonus spell slots by 1, improve to hit by 2, On turn end, Heal allies 1d3 + #level HP). Charge Charge at an enemy, dealing 3d8+1 damage. Each level adds +1 to damage. Deal 3d8+1+#level bludgeoning damage to an enemy. Cleave Sweeping attack strikes an adjacent enemy if lethal damage is dealt. Attack an enemy with spillover to adjacent targets. Defend Take a defensive stance. Grant yourself Defending (Improve AC by 2). Dig In Brace yourself, gaining +2 AC and +2 to saving throws for 4 rounds. Grant yourself Dug In (Improve AC by 2, improve all saves by 3, degrade to hit by 2). Dirty Trick Perform a dirty trick to blind or entangle an enemy, giving them -4 to hit for 2 rounds. An enemy suffers Blinded (Degrade to hit by 4, degrade evasion by 10, degrade all rolls by 2). Deactivate Device Attempt to disable a mechanical trap or device. An enemy suffers Disabled (Cannot take actions, Status effects do not expire) if inanimate. Dodge Focus on dodging attacks, granting you evasion and enhanced AC. Grant yourself Dodging (Improve AC by 2, improve evasion by 5). Rage Enter a frenzied state. Grant yourself Raging (Improve to hit by 1, improve bonus damage by 2, degrade AC by 3). Ensnare Entangle an enemy with vines, reducing their speed and giving them -2 to hit for 3 rounds. An enemy suffers Entangled (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade to hit by 2, degrade evasion by 5, degrade initiative by 5). Scream Let out a horrific scream. All enemies suffer Frightened (Degrade to hit by 2, degrade initiative by 5, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade all saves by 2). Escape Run away! Force yourself to flee. Hide Attempt to hide from enemies. Grant yourself Hidden (Improve AC by 4, improve evasion by 10, On attack, Remove Hidden from self). Hunter's Mark Mark an enemy, giving them -2 AC and +1d4 damage from all attacks for 5 rounds. An enemy suffers Hunting Prey (Degrade AC by 2, On attacked, Deal 1d8 true damage to self). Infect Infect an enemy with a virulent disease. Cast ability Inflict Disease (An enemy suffers Diseased (Degrade Constitution by 2, degrade all saves by 2, On turn end, Deal 1d4 necrotic damage to self).) on an enemy. Inspire Inspire your allies, granting them a +2 bonus to attack rolls for the next 3 rounds. Grant all allies Inspired (Improve to hit by 2, Gain 5 temporary HP, improve all saves by 1). Maul Make a powerful attack that deals 1d6 + strength modifier extra damage and inflicts Bleed on a successful hit. Attack an enemy; Deal 1d6 + statMod(#str) bludgeoning damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Bleeding (On turn end, Deal 1d2 bleed damage to self); An enemy suffers Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1). Meditate Enter a meditative state. Grant yourself Meditating (Cannot take actions, improve Save versus Magic by 2, 25% resistance to Force, On turn end, Heal self 1d2 + #level HP). Melee Attack Use your primary weapon. Attack an enemy. Overwatch Make an attack of opportunity against the first enemy that melee attacks you or an ally before your next turn. Grant yourself Overwatching (Improve bonus damage by 2, On enemy melee, Attack attacker; Purge self of Overwatching). Poison Bite Bite an enemy, dealing 1d4 damage and poisoning them. Deal 1d4 poison damage to an enemy. Poison Weapon Coat your weapon in poison for your next 2 attacks. Grant yourself poisoning blade (On attack hit, Self suffers Poison (On turn end, Deal 1d4 true damage to self) for 3 turns). Prepare Charge Prepare to charge on your next turn, gaining +2 to hit and +2 damage. Grant yourself Preparing to Charge (Improve to hit by 2, improve bonus damage by 2, Next move compelled to be charge, On attack, Remove Preparing to Charge from self for 1 turn). Ranged Attack Fire your primary weapon. Attack an enemy. Rapid Strike Quickly inflict damage. Attack an enemy; Attack an enemy; Attack an enemy. Reckless Attack Make a powerful double attack that deals +2 damage each, but you take -2 to hit and +2 AC for 2 rounds. Attack an enemy; Attack an enemy; Self suffers Reckless (Degrade to hit by 2, degrade AC by 2). Roundhouse Kick Make a powerful kick that strikes all enemies for 1d4 + 1 + level/3 bludgeoning damage. Deal 1d4+1+round(#level/3) bludgeoning damage to all enemies. Second Wind Regain 1d10 + level hit points. Heal yourself 1d10 + #level HP. Sets Spear Brace your spear to intercept a charging enemy, dealing 3d8 damage and granting +4 to hit when they charge you next turn. Grant yourself Braced (On enemy charge, Deal 3d8+1 piercing damage to self for 2 turns). Smash Unleash a powerful blow. Deal 2d6 + #level bludgeoning damage to an enemy. Smoke Screen Create a smoke screen that grants all allies within it evasion and 4 AC for 3 rounds. Grant your party Hidden (Improve AC by 4, improve evasion by 10, On attack, Remove Hidden from self). Stomp Stomp the ground, dealing 1d6 bludgeoning damage to all adjacent enemies and knocking them prone. Deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Prone (Cannot take actions, degrade Dexterity by 2). Call Animal Companion A friendly animal comes to your aid in battle. Summon animal. Taunt Taunt an enemy, forcing them to target you on their next turn. An enemy suffers Taunted (Next target forced to be you). Trickfire Toss a firebomb that damages and confuses enemies. Deal 1d4 fire damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Confused (Actions are random). Wait Wait and do nothing this turn. Does nothing. Whirlwind Attack Swing your weapon in a wide arc, attacking all enemies within reach. Attack all enemies.

Firebolt

Frostbite

?? School of Evocation A chilling blast of cold air. Deal 1d4 cold damage to an enemy.

Ghost Touch

?? School of Transmutation Induce necrosis with your touch. Grant yourself Ghost Touch (On attack hit, Deal 1d3 necrotic damage to target).

Haste

5 School of Transmutation Increase an ally's speed. Grant an ally Haste (Improve Dexterity by 4, improve initiative by 10, improve attacks per turn by 1, improve AC by 2).

Implosion

8 School of Evocation Create a powerful gravitational collapse at a target location, damaging all enemies within the area. Deal 10d6 force damage to all enemies.

Invisibility

6 School of Illusion Turn invisible for 5 rounds or until you attack or cast a spell. Grant yourself or an ally Invisible (Invisible, On attack, Remove Invisible from self, On offensive casting, Remove Invisible from self).

Lightning Strike

4 School of Evocation Strike random enemies with lightning, dealing 1d8 damage and paralyzing them for 1 round. Deal 1d8 electric damage to 2 random enemies; 2 random enemies suffer Paralyzed (Cannot take actions, degrade Strength by 5, degrade Dexterity by 5).

Magebane

2 School of Abjuration Create an aura that harms enemy spellcasters when they cast spells. Grant an enemy Magebane (On enemy casting, Deal 2d6 true damage to caster for 3 turns).

Maze

8 School of Conjuration Banish an enemy to a labyrinthine demiplane for up to 10 minutes. An enemy suffers In Maze (Cannot take actions, Untargetable).

Minor Ward

?? School of Abjuration Create a magical ward that absorbs damage. Grant yourself Minor Warded (Improve Save versus Magic by 1, 25% resistance to Force, Gain =7 + #level temporary HP).

Mirror Image

Obscuring Mist

Paralyzing Touch

2 School of Necromancy Touch an enemy to paralyze them for 2 rounds. An enemy suffers Paralyzed (Cannot take actions, degrade Strength by 5, degrade Dexterity by 5).

?? School of Conjuration Create a cloud of soot that reveals hidden or invisible creatures. Remove hidden
